attributes.action: 1) Encourage the use of waste energy at non peak hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reduce consumption of electricity during peak hours and start using green energy when demand is low. 
e.g. household use of elecricity and gas at non peak times.

Power stations run at a consistant level according to maximum demand which is increasing, however when demand is low, such as during the early hours in the morning the same amount of power is produced and therefore wasted.
